name: strawjs
author: Paul Gordon
description: A static site generator for those who can't get enough of RawJS

scripts.bundle-core: cd core && tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && cd .. && npm run esm-core
scripts.bundle-cli: cd cli && tsc -p tsconfig.json && terser ./+build/straw.js > ./+build/straw.min.js && npm run esm
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-core && npm run bundle-cli
scripts.release: npm run bundle && cd ./+build && cp ../package.json ./package.json && np && cp ./package.json ../package.json
